trends: There has been one other sighting in Pretoria
There were no other sightings in Pretoria on or around September 29th 2013
divs: sighting detailslast nite at pretoria north,gone to get some dinner when a friend pointed out alight in the sky,we looked up and saw this stunning glow like light in the sky we thought it was a prank then many people gatherd and staired at this beauty,it was round wirh a sort of halo around and above never seen enything like that amazing,many friends around the world said they saw somthing similler last night 29\09\13 what is going on? maybe its becouse of nibiru aproching ? it was there for +- 30min then just vanished
Summary: big round with shiny halo above
